Wisdom 'Wiz' Kudowor (amụrụ na Septemba 19, 1957) bụ onye na-ese ihe si Ghana.
Kudowor gụrụ akwụkwọ na College of Art, University of Science and Technology, Ghana
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na 1981 ma nweta akara ugo mmụta klas mbụ na nka.
Ọ haziri ma rụọ ọrụ ọha na eze na Ghana gụnyere ihe osise enyemaka na Kwame Nkrumah Memorial Park
A na-egosi ọrụ ya na nchịkọta ọha na eze, gụnyere Artists Alliance Gallery na Labadi, Accra.
